items.title: Caterpillar Inc. stock underperforms Monday when compared to competitors despite daily gains

items.title: Will CAT's Dividend Hike Revive Investor Confidence in Uncertain Times?
items.description: Caterpillar lifts its quarterly dividend by 7% to $1.51, marking 31 straight years of hikes despite recent revenue softness.
